Ava Auto Club (AAC)

Luxury & Exotic Rental Car App

VIEW LIVE DEMO

AAC is hosted on Heroku

I Started building this app when I was reading the ng-book which is a book on Angular 2 by Ari Lerner & friends, which is an industry standard of a book when building Angular 2(&up) Applications. Anyway I finished with chapter 3 & wanted to try my hand at building an app to make sure I lock down the skills i had just learnt. So I starting putting this little gem together (the AAC app) with this app was my first time working with AngularMaterial Form but Material made this a breeze & have since worked with it in a few apps including a variant of TeraData's Open Source App Covalent.

AVA AUTO CLUB or AutoPassport as it's handle on github is an Exotic Rental Car App cobbled together with inspiration from https://www.gothamdreamcars.com + https://luxurycarrentalusa.com + https://classiccarclubmanhattan.com & http://southbeachexoticrentals.com. And as well inspired by USA Television series SUITS (Harvey Specter's membership to a Car Club.

Running on these technologies -
